publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4963 Ms Sandra White: Lebanon Visit—That the Parliament extends its support to those, including MSPs from many different parties, who are currently in Lebanon in an attempt to better understand the situation in the country through meeting the government and touring the worst-hit areas of the country; wishes them all the success possible, and recognises that these types of venture serve to boost Scotland’s standing on the world stage by demonstrating the values of collaboration and understanding that we wish to promote. Supported by: Christine Grahame*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Jim Mather*, Chris Ballance*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4963 Lebanon Visit (lodged on 17 October 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-4963 Lebanon Visit (lodged on 17 October 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4963 Lebanon Visit (lodged on 17 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4963 Lebanon Visit (lodged on 17 October 2006) Rosie Kane*
